comment: As long as you do the work that is assigned, then you will be fine. He reminds the class when the assignments are due, which is very nice of him.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Gives good feedback--Lots of homework

comment: He used a 3rd party platform. Responded to emails quickly, sent reminders before due dates, late work is unacceptable. Gave plenty of times for assignments & everything was very simple. Modules were a little long but it took me about 2-3 hours per module to complete them. Definitely recommend!

Course is on Bearface, which is a platform I had never heard of before. Good thing is that it is super easy to navigate. I never interacted with Professor Bell one-on-one, but he sent reminders for us frequently and is a nice guy.
professor bell is great! You can tell he genuinely loves teaching. The course is extremely easy. All work is done through bear face and is due every couple of weeks.

Dr. Bell was an amazing professor who genuinely just wants to teach and engage with the class. He does want you to interact but honestly, it's a pleasant class. There is a set of assignments due about every 2 weeks and they are mostly completion grades except the Quiz at the end. All assignments are online and the quizzes do not require lockdown.

Pretty cool laid back guy. Lectures can get boring, and most coursework is online reading the online textbook. No final, which is nice, but module quizzes will kick you in the butt with the amount of stuff you have to memorize. Other grades will carry you though.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: As long as u know how to do your work youre good. I procrastinated every week the day it was due and still did good. Sometimes ahead of time. He was really nice and understanding. If I had an issue I always emailed him prior. Must be present for lecture for the powerpoints. everything is on bearface. Easy A. Take him!!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria

comment: Easy A

Class was very easy and so was work. All quizzes were open-note and each module had lots of assignments. Lecture heavy, but very nice guy and made the class enjoyable. Textbook and attendance are required. Some physical activity required, but not much.

Professor Bell is a very passionate professor. He's really funny and he can make class interesting. He's very understanding about any issues that may come up as well. However, if you miss more than 3 days you're dropped from the class.

Prof Bell was a great professor. Wellness is pretty much an online class even if you take it in person so if you do the online work you will get an easy A. deadlines are laid out but easy to miss, most of the work you just click through for full credit though. He is very understanding and works to know everyones name, i definitely recommend him!
He is so nice and cares about your success. One of my favorite professors so far.

He's a sweet old man. You must attend class because you receive an F if you have more than 6 absences. There's a good bit of homework and quizzes but they are all online. The midterm and final were online as well. He teaches you everything you need to know in lecture! Very easy A as long as you put in some effort
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: He gave great lectures and I learned a lot from this course! The modules are easy to get done and smart to do them ahead of time. He used BearTrack instead of d2l and I think it's better.

Prof Bell was amazing. He made the class super fun and pretty easy. There is an online module where you do all your homework and then one final at the end that is pretty easy if you just go to class. He tries hard to help his students understand and enjoy the material. Would definitely take any class he taught again.

He's an awesome guy. This class is an easy A. I rarely showed up to class and I still got an A. As long as you do the 6 modules online you are good! He lectures in class a lot but is a really nice guy. He also communicates really well if you need to email him or talk after class. He doesn't want anyone to fail. Take him if you get the chance.
Such a sweet man. Lectures are boring but attendance counts for your grade. Show up, do the assignments, and it is such an easy A. Highly recommend taking him for this class.

Dr. Bell is a caring man who wants to see every student pass. He is lecture heavy in class but makes the online program accessible with plenty of time.  The Online program that he uses is well structured and revolved around lecture in class. 100% would take again.
Dr. Bell is a solid teacher. He does a good job of explaining the information. He can tend to drone on, but he also tries to keep the class engaged.

Professor Bell is a sweet man. He kept opening up our assignments again, because he didn't want anyone to fail. The class is kind of boring, because it's such a long lecture. He also tries to go over time for every class, but he'll let you go as soon as he realizes he's went over. He's super sweet, and he really enjoys teaching about health.

He is very nice and wants to see students do well. It's obvious that wellness and fitness is hit life. He is a little older so when he uses the online textbook and PowerPoints he sometimes does things in a round-about-way. Overall easy class.

Take his class!!! He is a sweet southern old man that really cares about the subject he is teaching. He is very understanding and will always work with you. Professor Bell really cares about his students and tries to make the class interesting. I would take his class again... you won't regret it if you take him.
